section.title: Basic usage
section.p: Write https://gtsvn.uit.no/langtech/trunk into the URL box. Choose the folder where you would like to place the files in the Destination Directory box (we suggest adding langtech to the end of the path, to keep svn folders in a separate place), then press OK.
Press "Permanently" when the SSL Certificate dialog appears.

section.title: Working with the repository
section.p: In the directory that you did the checkout you will now have a directory called langtech where all our code is contained. Usually the daily work goes on in the repos/trunk directory.
